author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Rita Ora seen out in LA wearing see-through gym pants | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now In the BeyHive: Rita took to Instagram to congratulate Beyonce on her pregnancy, reposting the 35-year-old's photo 'First and foremost, Jay Z is my inspiration and one of my idols - lyrically, musically, business-wise. I still look up to him and his wife every day. Beyoncé was one of my biggest idols growing up,' she told Vanity Fair in October. 'I find it incredibly rude and disrespectful to women in general [when] we get accused of something that’s basically against the important part - the music.' Rumors emerged Beyonce, 35, was referencing Rita in the song Sorry, where she referred to her husband cheating with someone she simply called 'Becky with the good hair'. While the pregnant pop icon never addressed the rumors, the I Will Never Let You Down singer vehemently denied it's about her. Purely platonic: Despite rumors, Rita has denied an affair with Jay Z. 'First and foremost, Jay Z is my inspiration and one of my idols' It's a busy time for the British beauty, who aside from reprising her role as Mia Grey in Fifty Shades Darker, is also hosting the current season of America's Next Top Model. But she maintains music is her true passion. 'Music is my first love,' she told Vanity Fair. 'It was the thing I came into the entertainment industry to do in the first place.' Keeping it casual: The British pop star was dressed down as she left LA's Milk Studios on Wednesday Read more: Share or comment on this article 6
